description:
Your personal research assistant

Zotero is a free, easy-to-use tool to help you collect, organize, annotate, cite, and share research.
- New item fields and creator types
  - DOI for every item type
  - PMID and PMCID for journal articles
  - Original Place, Original Publisher, and Original Date for books
  - Publisher and Place for webpages and journal/newspaper/magazine articles
  - Place for multiple types
  - Creator (equivalent to Author) for multiple types
  - Many more
- Fixed broken citation dialog after a chosen style was renamed
- Fixed ebook hyphenation setting not applying when reader opens
- Fixed a bug that could cause some plugin preferences to be lost when disabling the plugin
